item.title: My First Post
item.description: May 30, 2019 I created this basic poker game utilizing python dictionaries and lists. The game prompts allows for multiple players and deals shuffled cards of 5 cards from a full deck. The player hand with the highest card value is evaluated as the winning hand. If there is a tie within highest cards, the second highest is compared within the hands and third highest etc until a tie is broken.
